name: Galactic Getaway
description:
Due to the complexity of implementing the enemy's line of sight in this particular type of game, we acknowledge that this may not be our finest game to date. Given the constraints of being a gamejam game and the limited time available, we made several mistakes and were unable to give it our full effort.

A thrilling and challenging game where you take on the role of an alien trying to escape from the clutches of humans. You find yourself trapped in a building with human enemies lurking around every corner, and your only hope of escape is to stealthily navigate your way to the top floor and escape through a portal to safety. Will you be able to make it out alive?

"Galactic Getaway" is an exciting game that will test your stealth and strategy skills as you attempt to make your way through each level undetected. The game features 3 levels, each with increasing difficulty and obstacles that will make your escape all the more challenging. The game is set in a building with multiple floors, and your task is to make your way to the top floor and reach the portal that will transport you to safety.

As you progress through each level, you will encounter human enemies who are on the lookout for any suspicious activity. You must  avoid detection as you sneak past them to reach your goal.

= Game Design & Development  Lead - Rayyan Aziz

= Level Designer - Ammar Ali

= 3D Modeler - Mahad Kiani

= VFX Artist - Shaheer Kiani

We used Feel (Unity Asset) for Camera shake and other small game feel stuff.
